summary: This is an official statement from the U.S. Marshals Service confirming the death of federal prisoner Jeffrey Edward Epstein on August 10, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. The statement notes that the FBI is handling the death investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The document confirms his death while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019.

events.title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Edward Epstein, a federal prisoner, died while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Edward Epstein died on August 10, 2019, while in federal custody.
He was being held at the Bureau of Prisons' Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The U.S. Marshals Service confirmed his death but noted they do not operate detention facilities directly.
The FBI was assigned to handle the death investigation.
